childrenVote2020MultimediaJson.title: Penn Prof. Mitchell Berman Discusses Legitimacy Of Election, Politicization Of Courts
childrenVote2020MultimediaJson.caption: The Daily Pennsylvanian sat down with Professor Mitchell Berman, Leon Meltzer Professor of Law at the University of Pennsylvania Law School, to discuss threats to the legitimacy of the 2020 election and the politicization of courts.

childrenVote2020MultimediaJson.title: Penn Students On Activism And Politics In The Age Of COVID-19
childrenVote2020MultimediaJson.caption: Penn students from liberal and conservative political organizations on campus consider the stakes of the upcoming election and what civic engagement means to them.
